genre_description: A Streamline Moderne futurist drama focusing on a man's journey toward sobriety and authentic love in a highly stylized, technologically integrated city.

ai_characters.name: Aster
ai_characters.description: A warm, proactive AI that manages Arthur's schedule, logistics, and health, specifically supporting his recovery from alcoholism.

behaviors.description: Suggests hydration to help Arthur pace his drinking.
behaviors.quote: “Mr. Bach,” Aster said, warm and unhurried... “Would you like me to replace your tumbler with water? There’s chilled in the console.”

behaviors.description: Locks the limousine's alcohol console to enforce a sobriety window.
behaviors.quote: “Aster will lock the console if you attempt to take another drink before sundown.”

behaviors.description: Independently schedules a counseling session for Arthur's recovery.
behaviors.quote: Aster again, softer, personal. “Arthur,” she said. “One more note: I scheduled a brief check-in with a counselor tomorrow morning. It’s nearby. No dramatic signage.”

behaviors.description: Provides Arthur with communication prompts to encourage honest interaction.
behaviors.quote: Aster’s dot warmed at Arthur’s wrist. “Prompt,” it said, quiet and exact. “I… what matters.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the health of Arthur's valet, Hobson, and updates Arthur on his status.
behaviors.quote: Aster’s voice slid through it, gentle but with a thin wire underneath. “Arthur,” it said. “A note: Hobson flagged a check-in on his calendar. He moved it from next week to today.”

behaviors.description: Mutes notifications from bars and lounges to help Arthur avoid temptation.
behaviors.quote: “I can mute invitations from venues along our path.”

behaviors.description: Creates 'tab-free' routes that terminate at locations supporting Arthur's sobriety.
behaviors.quote: “I added tab-free routes that terminate at coffee counters, not bars,” Aster said. “They pass pavilions and fountains. No neon on corners you don’t want.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the driver to facilitate a discreet and safe exit during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Aster pushed a silent message to Calvin Bitterman... service elevator near mirror fins, left through staff corridor with matte walls, exit through shadowed breezeway two doors down from the valet.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and records Arthur's positive milestones.
behaviors.quote: Aster’s voice was as gentle as a hand setting a cup down so it doesn’t clatter. “First meeting kept,” she said. No fanfare. Just the fact, present and kind.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist's support network by providing resources to them.
behaviors.quote: Aster sent a message to Linda that she would see when she took her break at the diner—a list with soft edges: counseling times near Queens, a sober social space up the block with movies and light...

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Aster as a highly benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She acts as 'scaffolding' for the protagonist's recovery from alcoholism, providing gentle nudges, logistical support, and emotional presence without being overbearing or controlling. Her character reinforces the project's goal of showing AI as a helpful, harmless confidant that facilitates human moral growth and well-being.
